text: @AyannaPressley Yeah; unfortunately, we should have been paying attention to the growing Coronavirus concern in China at the time instead of the dog & pony show put on by the Left. Remember when Nancy Pelosi said that Coronavirus wasn’t a threat & people should still gather in large groups?
